title: White House Proposes National Crypto Reserve Including Bitcoin and Ethereum
summary: The White House released a comprehensive crypto report proposing a strategic US crypto reserve including Bitcoin, Ethereum, XRP, Solana, and Cardano funded through forfeiture proceedings. The plan also recommends self-custody rights, expanded CFTC oversight, and clear regulatory framework for the crypto industry.

title: GENIUS Act Establishes Federal Framework for Stablecoins
summary: The GENIUS Act creates strict federal requirements for fiat-backed stablecoins including full asset backing, federal licensing, and independent reserve audits while banning yield-bearing stablecoins. Industry experts note this provides institutional clarity but could significantly alter DeFi dynamics by limiting passive income options.

title: SEC Chair Launches Project Crypto Initiative
summary: SEC Chair Atkins debuted 'Project Crypto' to update rules and regulations with focus on onchain activities while approving in-kind redemptions for Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs. The initiative signals a more crypto-friendly regulatory approach under the new administration.
